name: MooAPI Game Server
short_description: This is a server side implementation of the Multiplayer Online Object protocol (MooAPI) as found in Clickteam products such as The Games Factory, Multimedia Fusion and Jamagic. This game server runs on the Java platform and is truly cross platform.
